page.title: 06 Reeds Nurseries
page.content: Reeds Nurseries is in Shipton just off the A19.It is south of the village.Mr Reed is a wholesale grower of conifers.He has over a 100 types of conifers.The land he owns is 3\ acres.His favourate plant is called {Juniperus Squamata Bluestar.}Mr Reed and his workers take over 6000 cuttings a week.They put the cuttings in tubs,when the roots grow stronger they are ready to be potted.The plants he grows are sold to garden centres all over the country.Mr Reed has 4 workers 5 including himself.Two of them work part time and two work full time and he works all the time.All the workers have to know how to do each job.He sells 16000 conifers a week.There are 3 big greenhouses and several smaller ones.The firm has been going for 31 years.
